description:
A universal design with a rotating tip pressed into each end (11.3mm and 16.3mm) so it removes both square taper and splined (ISIS Drive™, Octalink®) crank arms with 22 x 1mm threads.

  • Includes 2 rotating tips (11.3 and 16.3mm) to remove Ocatlink and ISIS Drive crank arms, and tapered-holed crank arms
name: Park Tool CWP-7 Universal Crank Puller - Square/Splined
